channel.title: Suface Tension helicopter glitch
channel.description:
I am getting a glitch on Surface Tension. When I take down the helicopter on the cliff side it just falls instead of crashing into the rocks and clearing the way as I have seen on videos. I've tried several times and tried loading earlier saves with the same result so I cannot get past this point.
The map ID is bm_c2a5c
setpos -11547.145508 -9617.270508 4175.320801;setang 3.116664 -148.234436 0.000000
Windows 7 64bit, HD7850OC, i7 2600k, 8GB RAM. ![bm_c2a5c0000.jpg|690x500](upload://AiLPF1lht543Q4iXQl8Z697YBEO.jpeg)

item.title: Suface Tension helicopter glitch
item.dc:creator: SkySi
item.description:
I did use the rocket launcher only on the first few tries (since there’s an unlimited ammo box for it). I tried the guass canon later but did the same thing.

I eventually loaded a much earlier save (several hours back) and re-did the last few chapters and that has fixed it!

So glad cos I thought I wasn’t gonna beable to finish it!

Read full topic

item.title: Suface Tension helicopter glitch
item.dc:creator: Leijonasisu
item.description:
Don’t use the TAU cannon. Use the rocket launcher, there’s a lot of ammo around for it. Enough to kill it with the RL.

After a few hits it should lure the helicopter towards the area where it is supposed to crash. You could try ‘no-clipping’ past that area if you need to.

The TAU cannon is completely bugged with helicopters.

Read full topic
